trans-unit.source: Provides information about the state of a thread in an ASP.NET process.
trans-unit.target: 提供有关 ASP.NET 进程的线程的状态信息。

trans-unit.source: ASP.NET health monitoring allows production and operations staff to manage deployed Web applications.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET 运行状况监视，用于管理已部署的 Web 应用程序的生产和操作人员。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Management> namespace contains the health-event types responsible for packaging application health-status data and the provider types responsible for processing this data.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Management>命名空间包含负责打包应用程序运行状况状态数据和负责处理此数据提供程序类型的运行状况事件类型。</xref:System.Web.Management>

trans-unit.source: It also contains supporting types that help during the management of health events.
trans-unit.target: 它还包含在管理运行状况事件期间帮助的支持类型。

trans-unit.source: Instances of the WebThreadInformation class contain information that is obtained using either the <xref:System.Web.Management.WebErrorEvent> type or the <xref:System.Web.Management.WebRequestErrorEvent> type.
trans-unit.target: WebThreadInformation 类的实例包含使用获取的信息<xref:System.Web.Management.WebErrorEvent>类型或<xref:System.Web.Management.WebRequestErrorEvent>类型。</xref:System.Web.Management.WebRequestErrorEvent> </xref:System.Web.Management.WebErrorEvent>

trans-unit.source: Your application needs the appropriate permissions to access protected information provided by this type.
trans-unit.target: 你的应用程序需要访问受保护的信息，此类型提供的适当权限。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > In most cases you will be able to use the ASP.NET health-monitoring types as implemented, and you will control the health-monitoring system by specifying values in the `healthMonitoring` configuration section.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 在大多数情况下，你将是一种能够使用 ASP.NET 运行状况监视类型，因为实现，并且将通过指定中的值控制运行状况监视系统`healthMonitoring`配置节。

trans-unit.source: You can also derive from the health-monitoring types to create your own custom events and providers.
trans-unit.target: 你还可以从要创建你自己的自定义事件和提供程序的运行状况监视类型派生。

trans-unit.source: For an example of creating a custom event class, see the example provided in this topic.
trans-unit.target: 有关创建自定义的事件类的示例，请参阅本主题中提供的示例。

trans-unit.source: Formats thread-related information.
trans-unit.target: 设置与线程相关的信息的格式。

trans-unit.source: The FormatToString method provides a uniform format for event information, which is useful if the event data must be logged and later presented to the user.
trans-unit.target: FormatToString 方法为事件信息，这很有用，如果必须记录事件数据，并将其更高版本提供给用户提供统一的格式。

trans-unit.source: It is called internally when the provider invokes one of the <xref:System.Web.Management.WebBaseEvent.ToString%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 当提供程序调用之一时内部调用<xref:System.Web.Management.WebBaseEvent.ToString%2A>方法。</xref:System.Web.Management.WebBaseEvent.ToString%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.Management.WebEventFormatter"></xref> that contains the tab and indentation settings used to format the Web health event information.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.Management.WebEventFormatter"> </xref>包含制表符和缩进设置用于格式化 Web 运行状况事件信息。

trans-unit.source: Gets the current thread-impersonation mode.
trans-unit.target: 获取当前线程模拟模式。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the thread is executing in impersonation mode; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果在模拟模式，则执行线程否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the current thread-managed stack trace.
trans-unit.target: 获取当前托管线程的堆栈跟踪。

trans-unit.source: The thread-managed stack trace.
trans-unit.target: 托管线程的堆栈跟踪。

trans-unit.source: Gets the thread account name.
trans-unit.target: 获取线程帐户名。

trans-unit.source: The account returned by this property might be arbitrary if the thread is executing in impersonation mode.
trans-unit.target: 此属性返回的帐户可能是任意的如果在模拟模式下执行线程。

trans-unit.source: The thread account name.
trans-unit.target: 线程帐户名称。

trans-unit.source: Gets the current thread identifier.
trans-unit.target: 获取当前线程标识符。

trans-unit.source: Even if managed threads might not have direct mapping to the OS threads, for debugging purposes, it is always useful to isolate a specific thread where problems might exist.
trans-unit.target: 即使托管的线程可能不会直接映射到 OS 线程，以便进行调试，并总是有用若要隔离特定线程可能存在问题。

trans-unit.source: The current thread identifier.
trans-unit.target: 当前线程标识符。
